summary: An astronaut and his android double travel back to the time of King Arthur.
cast: Dennis Dugan|Jim Dale|Ron Moody|Kenneth More|John Le Mesurier|Rodney Bewes|Sheila White|Robert Beatty|Cyril Shaps|Kevin Brennan|Ewen Solon|Pat Roach|Reg Lye|Bruce Boa|Al Lampert|Derek Suthern
keywords: time travel|time travel into the past|reference to a connecticut yankee in king arthur's court|backwards time travel|accidental time travel
title: Un astronauta en la corte del Rey Arturo
